field.comment: Enter your mnotify SMS API Username
field.tooltip: Your api key must be the same as your mnotify api key

group.label: When a New Order is Placed

field.label: Enable Customer Notification
field.comment: This option will send SMS when an Order is Placed

field.label: Enter the Sender ID
field.comment: ‘Company’ e.g. 'My Store’ (max: 11 alphanumeric characters. This is who the SMS will appear from when received)
field.tooltip: You can enter upto 11 digits or characters

field.label: Enter the Message
field.comment: Your Message Content, (Max 918 characters. Text over 160 characters may incurs multiple credit charges)
field.tooltip: Enter your default message. You can use {{firstname}} for Firstname, {{middlename}} for Middlename, {{lastname}} for Lastname, {{fax}} for Fax, {{postal}} for Post Code, {{city}} for City, {{email}} for EmailAddress and {{order_id}} for Order Number.
